subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Rick Tocchet, a former N.H.L. player and a Phoenix Coyotes assistant, pleaded guilty to running a sports gambling ring, but may not have to serve jail time.
snippet: Rick Tocchet, a former N.H.L. player and a Phoenix Coyotes assistant, pleaded guilty to running a sports gambling ring, but may not have to serve jail time.
